pages.title: Down in the Bayou
pages.text: Finally, you can get to the $(thing)Betweenlands$(). This plane sits between all others, and as such is much closer to the plane of $(thing)Divinity$(), where the gods reside. My hope is that this will make it possible for us to directly commune with them. To enter, simply use the $(item)Swamp Talisman$() on any sapling to produce a $(thing)Portal Tree$()
